record.field: abrir stock por ubicacion en suggest
code

object = record # Available locals: # - time, datetime, dateutil: Python libraries # - env: Odoo Environement # - model: Model of the record on which the action is triggered # - object: Record on which the action is triggered if there is one, otherwise None # - workflow: Workflow engine # - log : log(message), function to log debug information in logging table # - Warning: Warning Exception to use with raise # To return an action, assign: action = {...} action = object.product_id.view_stock_detail()
Stock On Hand en suggest
code

object = record # Available locals: # - time, datetime, dateutil: Python libraries # - env: Odoo Environement # - model: Model of the record on which the action is triggered # - object: Record on which the action is triggered if there is one, otherwise None # - workflow: Workflow engine # - log : log(message), function to log debug information in logging table # - Warning: Warning Exception to use with raise # To return an action, assign: action = {...} action = env.ref('stock.product_open_quants') action_read = action.read()[0] action_read['domain'] = [('product_id', '=', object.product_id.id)] action = action_read

Stock Traceability en sale order line
code

context = dict(env.context) object = record # Available locals: # - time, datetime, dateutil: Python libraries # - env: Odoo Environement # - model: Model of the rhttp://erp.ingenieriaboggio.com.ar/web#notebook_page_358ecord on which the action is triggered # - object: Record on which the action is triggered if there is one, otherwise None # - workflow: Workflow engine # - log : log(message), function to log debug information in logging table # - Warning: Warning Exception to use with raise # To return an action, assign: action = {...}
action = env.ref('stock.act_product_stock_move_open') action_read = action.read()[0] context = { 'search_default_future': 1, 'search_default_picking_type': 1, 'search_default_product_id': object.product_id.id, 'default_product_id': object.product_id.id} action_read['context'] = context action = action_read

abrir stock por ubicacion en stock.picking lupa
code

active_id = env.context.get('active_id') active_model = env.context.get('active_model') if active_model != 'stock.move': raise Warning('Active model erroneo')
record = env[active_model].browse(active_id)
action = record.product_id.view_stock_detail()

Calcula Info CC y DV
code

venta_pesos = record.amount_untaxed*record.currency_id.inverse_rate desc_volumen = 100.0-record.pricelist_id.x_ajuste_lista*((venta_pesos>15000 and venta_pesos<=70000) and (1.0-0.97) *(venta_pesos-15000)/(15000-70000) +1.0 or ((venta_pesos>70000 and venta_pesos<=300000) and (0.97-0.95)*(venta_pesos-70000)/(70000-300000)+0.97 or (venta_pesos>300000 and 0.95 or 1.0))) desc_volumen1 = ' / DV: ' + str(round(desc_volumen,2))
x_info_cc = record.team_id.id !=1 and (record.env['x_bi_sql_view.dias_deuda_cliente7'].search( [['x_partner_id', '=', record.commercial_partner_id.id]]) and ( str( record.env['x_bi_sql_view.dias_deuda_cliente7'].search( [['x_partner_id', '=', record.commercial_partner_id.id]]).x_diasdeuda_c)+' dias / d_venc: '+ str( record.env['x_bi_sql_view.dias_deuda_cliente7'].search( [['x_partner_id', '=', record.commercial_partner_id.id]]).x_deuda_venc) + "/ " + record.commercial_partner_id.abc_sales_amount+record.commercial_partner_id.x_abc_sales_freq) or "--") or "-portal-" record.write({'x_info_cc': x_info_cc + desc_volumen1 }) # Available variables: # - env: Odoo Environment on which the action is triggered # - model: Odoo Model of the record on which the action is triggered; is a void recordset # - record: record on which the action is triggered; may be void # - records: recordset of all records on which the action is triggered in multi-mode; may be void # - time, datetime, dateutil, timezone: useful Python libraries # - log: log(message, level='info'): logging function to record debug information in ir.logging table # - Warning: Warning Exception to use with raise # To return an action, assign: action = {...}
